name: Laniakea (Purple T Games)
description:
⚠️WARNING: GAMEPAD REQUIRED⚠️ DESCRIPTION:

Laniakea is an arcade/exploration game where you will have to travel across beautiful yet dangerous planets, picking the maximum exploration points in the minimum time. You will control a synthetic life being, also named Laniakea, that will have to survive several dangers while unravelling secrets and discovering the meaning of her own existence.

WHAT IS TO COME:
  • Plenty of planets to explore with different biomes
  • 8 Big Bosses
  • 3 Different modes (Story, Boss Rush and Local Versus)
  • Numerous Items and Upgrades
TEAM: Miguel BlásquizProducer/Game Dev.Aleix GiménezGame Designer/Game Dev.Manel Moreno
Game DeveloperJavier CarreñoGame DeveloperJavier F MoaresArt Dir./Graphic DesignerPaula CabezasConcept Art/Char. DesignerMax González3D Artist/AnimatorAJ ArgieComposer MEDIA:
